body:
I have an idea of a nebula map and know how I will make it but, I don't know how to format the map and stuff like that.

(Note: PLZ HELP)
body_tagged:

title: How do you make a map?

replies.body:
First, start with a void map, then build off that.
Worry about the YML and the downloads later.
replies.body_tagged:
First, start with a void map, then build off that.
Worry about the YML and the downloads later.

replies.body: how do you do a void map?
replies.body_tagged: how do you do a void map?

replies.body: Search for one online, then download it :P

replies.body: Go to new world, creative, no structers, cheats, presets for super flat, change the jsj3766xjrb thing to 1x0 then do either /up 1 or /setblock (cord) (cord) (cord) blockname AND BAM! Start building
